member.name: IDWriteRenderingParams1.GetGrayscaleEnhancedContrast
member.summary: Gets the amount of contrast enhancement to use for grayscale antialiasing.
member.returns: The contrast enhancement value. Valid values are greater than or equal to zero.

member.name: IDWriteRenderingParams1
member.summary: Represents text rendering settings for glyph rasterization and filtering.
